ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isrrvv.1 | |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) |
| 2 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( p = P -> dom p = dom P ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( p = P -> ( dom p MblFnM BrSiga ) = ( dom P MblFnM BrSiga ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-rrv | |- rRndVar = ( p e. Prob |-> ( dom p MblFnM BrSiga ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( dom P MblFnM BrSiga ) e. _V |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( P e. Prob -> ( rRndVar ` P ) = ( dom P MblFnM BrSiga ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( rRndVar ` P ) = ( dom P MblFnM BrSiga ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) <-> X e. ( dom P MblFnM BrSiga ) ) ) |
